DC.dc:creator: Kåre Vassenden
DC.dc:description: Country background is the person's own, the mother's or possibly the father's country of birth. Persons without an immigrant background always have Norway as country background. In cases where the parents have different countries of birth the mother's country of birth is chosen.
DC.dcterms:abstract: System for befolkningsstatistikk (BESYS) SKD - Sentralkontoret for folkeregistrering
DC.dc:rights: Statistical Metadata, produced by Statistics Norway for production of statistics and other universal use.
DC.dc:subject: 02.01.10 - Population
DC.dc:title: Country background

Common.Title: Country background
Common.Description: Country background is the person's own, the mother's or possibly the father's country of birth. Persons without an immigrant background always have Norway as country background. In cases where the parents have different countries of birth the mother's country of birth is chosen.
Common.Notes: From 1 January 2003 the definition was changed by also including the country of birth of the grandparents

ShortNameWeb.CodeText: Immigrants and Norwegian-born to immigrant parents
